name: Hamster Power: MechaForce
description:
Note: Some parts were rushed to submit the game so some elements will be poorly designed. This was created for the extra credits jam #3 with the theme "cycles".  Also, I was informed that the hamster won't display properly on some resolutions after I had already posted the game. It should display properly on any 16:9 resolution. Sorry for the inconvenience, testing for different resolutions completely slipped my mind during the jam.

Protect the city from giant lizards by taking control of a mecha, which just so happens to be powered by a hamster wheel. Any action from the mecha costs energy, so you will have to manage how much energy you spend compared to how much you generate.

This was a solo project and I was responsible for the art and programming though I did not create any of the audio.

This game uses these sounds from freesound:

concrete_step_1.wav by Movingplaif (https://freesound.org/people/movingplaid/sounds/76187/)

LAZER SOUND.wav by Neirbonad1 (https://freesound.org/people/neirbonad1/sounds/178055/)

Big Swipe.wav by LukeSharples (https://freesound.org/people/LukeSharples/sounds/209075/)

Squeak 01.wav by LG (https://freesound.org/people/LG/sounds/72655/)

Music by Eric Matyas

"Kingdom of Buffoons"

www.soundimage.org
